function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of validation for research results","Impact":"Potential for inaccurate or unproven best practices","Mitigation":"Conducting further research and validation efforts","Technologies":"Research and data collection tools","People":"Researchers, practitioners, contractors","Owner":"Research institutions, construction organizations"},{"Description":"Difficulty in acquiring quantitative data during a pandemic","Impact":"Limited availability of reliable data for research","Mitigation":"Developing alternative data collection methods, such as qualitative research and expert opinions","Technologies":"Data collection and analysis tools","People":"Research teams, data analysts","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Risk of implementing unvalidated best practices in construction projects","Impact":"Increased risk of spreading contagious diseases in construction environments","Mitigation":"Ensuring that best practices are validated and based on reliable data","Technologies":"Construction monitoring and safety technologies","People":"Contractors, construction workers","Owner":"Construction organizations, regulatory bodies"}]}
